# phyloseq.extended

<!-- [![Travis build status](https://travis-ci.org/jchiquet/janine.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/jchiquet/janine) -->

Various customs functions written to enhance the base functions of phyloseq. Most of them are used in the formation "Métagénomique 16S" provided by the platforms Migale and Genotoul

## Installation

You can install the development version of `phyloseq.extended` from github

``` r
remotes::install_github("mahendra-mariadassou/phyloseq-extended")
```
